topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54af03526368724485b70b00#post_54af03526368724485b70b00
You want to know who the person responsible for it and probably getting sued is?  Wu and Dan Olsen.

For those of you that don't know who Dan Olsen is he's Channel Awesome's(the people behind nostalgia critic) resident pedophile.  I just want to browse traps and here we are with kiddie didlers trying to bring down 8chan cause they think it's immoral or some crap.

I think reality officially broke at some point cause with all that drama going on we now have pedophiles soapbox preaching about how their morals are "superior" and Anonymous being civil going around talking about how doxxing and DDOS attacks are wrong and we shouldn't do them.

Couple niggas got burnt up due to all this violence
All you hear is the sound of the doosh doosh but no sirens_
